level.heading: Agreement on standards concerning rights and duties.

level.text: The parties may determine by agreement the standards measuring the fulfillment of the rights of a debtor or obligor and the duties of a secured party under a rule stated in ยง 28:9-602 if the standards are not manifestly unreasonable.
Subsection (a) does not apply to the duty under ยง 28:9-609 to refrain from breaching the peace.
